channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-12015] Not cleaning Mob data when Mob CF is removed from table
item.description: During modifyTable, if a MOB CF is removed from a table, the corresponding mob data also should get removed.
item.summary: Not cleaning Mob data when Mob CF is removed from table

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
JingchengDu Any chance for a patch? This is the only pending issue in MOB branch.
Any of our Huawei friends ready to take this up? cc Ashish Singhi, Ashutosh Jindal
Anoop Sam John I will look into this. Thanks for the pointer.

In DeleteColumnFamilyProcedure, state execution sequence is modified to delete the store files first then modify the table descriptor. We are following the same approach in DeleteTableProcedure.

Patch for review.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12744247/HBASE-12015.patch
against master branch at commit f5ad736282c8c9c27b14131919d60b72834ec9e4.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12744247

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 4 new or modified tests.

-1 patch. The patch command could not apply the patch.

Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/14702//console

This message is automatically generated.

Pankaj, suffix the patch name with branch name.
For example, HBASE-12015-hbase-11339.patch
On the behalf of Pankaj, attaching the same patch with proper naming so that the patch can trigger Hadoop QA.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment

against hbase-11339 branch at commit f5ad736282c8c9c27b14131919d60b72834ec9e4.
ATTACHMENT ID: 12744268

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 4 new or modified tests.

+1 hadoop versions. The patch compiles with all supported hadoop versions (2.4.0 2.4.1 2.5.0 2.5.1 2.5.2 2.6.0 2.7.0)

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

+1 lineLengths. The patch does not introduce lines longer than 100

+1 site. The mvn post-site goal succeeds with this patch.

Found the following in some of the failed tests:


Caused by: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/apache/htrace/HTraceConfiguration

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.HRegionServer.<init>(HRegionServer.java:577)

	at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.HMaster.<init>(HMaster.java:357)

Test environment seems to have had some issue.
Same patch for rerun.

+   * @param mobFamilyDir The table directory.

Correct description for the parameter.

For testMobFamilyDelete, please close table at the end.

My bad, i forgot to put the branch name.

Thanks Ashish Singhi for attaching patch with proper name.
Thanks Ted Yu for reviewing the patch. Addressed your findings in the V2 patch.

The test case adds only one CF and later try remove it. This will cause issue in trunk code base. ( we don't allow removing single cf).. So pls add one more CF to table in test.
I believe the fix for TestDeleteMobTable is already contained in the mega patch v4 for HBASE-11339.
Thanks Anoop Sam John, added one more CF in the test case.

+1
Will commit after QA run
